option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.ResultSceneController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="496.0" prefWidth="761.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="506.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" width="768.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="400.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 50; -fx-arc-width: 50;" width="670.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="45.0" layoutY="89.0" prefHeight="359.0" prefWidth="670.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Practice Complete! Nice work!" textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="30.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Keep goingâ€”consistent practice builds speed and accuracy." textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="20.0" /> </font> </Text> <StackPane prefHeight="161.0" prefWidth="670.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#f0f0f0" height="163.0" stroke="#cccccc" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="2.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 40; -fx-arc-width: 40;" width="375.0" /> <VBox prefHeight="172.0" prefWidth="412.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Accuracy:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> <HBox.margin> <Insets /> </HBox.margin> </Text> <Text fx:id="accuracyValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Accuracy}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="40.0" /> </VBox.margin> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Time Consumed:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="timeValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Time Consumed}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Characters Typed:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="charactersValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Characters}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="35.0" /> </VBox.margin> </StackPane> </children> </VBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="51.0" layoutY="361.0" prefHeight="107.0" prefWidth="670.0" spacing="100.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="mainMenuButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onMainMenu" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="MAIN MENU" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="leaderboardButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onLeaderboard" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/leaderboard.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="letsTypeButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onPracticeAgain" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="TRY AGAIN?" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

-fx-background-radius: 100;" text="MAIN MENU" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="leaderboardButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onLeaderboard" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/leaderboard.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="letsTypeButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onPracticeAgain" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="TRY AGAIN?" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane fx:id="rootPane" prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.ResultSceneController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="496.0" prefWidth="761.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="506.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" width="768.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="400.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 50; -fx-arc-width: 50;" width="670.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="45.0" layoutY="48.0" prefHeight="400.0" prefWidth="670.0"> <children> <HBox fx:id="starsContainer" alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="670.0" spacing="40.0"> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="30.0" top="40.0" /> </VBox.margin> </HBox> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Good Effort! Practice makes perfect!" textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="30.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Keep it up! Each star marks a step closer to mastery." textAlignment="CENTER"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="20.0" /> </font> </Text> <StackPane prefHeight="161.0" prefWidth="670.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#f0f0f0" height="163.0" stroke="#cccccc" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="2.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 40; -fx-arc-width: 40;" width="375.0" /> <VBox prefHeight="172.0" prefWidth="412.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Words per Minute:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="wpmValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{WPM}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="20.0" /> </VBox.margin> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Accuracy:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="accuracyValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Accuracy}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Time Consumed:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="timeValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Time Left}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefWidth="295.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Characters Typed:" HBox.hgrow="NEVER"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fx:id="charactersValue" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Characters}" HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="12.0" /> </VBox.margin> </StackPane> </children> </VBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="51.0" layoutY="361.0" prefHeight="107.0" prefWidth="670.0" spacing="100.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="mainMenuButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onMainMenu" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="MAIN MENU" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="leaderboardButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onLeaderboard" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/leaderboard.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="letsTypeButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onLetsType" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="TRY AGAIN?" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>
